title: Automating Repetitive Tasks: Productivity Hacks for Developers
description: How to deploy your Next.js apps on Vercel.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Building progressive Web Apps: Bridging the Gap Between Web and Mobile
description: Integrating mindfulness practices helps developers cultivate present-moment awareness, fostering focus, problem-solving, and work-life balance.
author: Aditya Aman
body:

Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) bring the best of both worlds, offering fast, reliable, and engaging user experiences. Throughout my journey in web development, I have explored and worked with modern technologies like Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, Express.js, and Node.js while integrating authentication, payment gateways, AI, and full-stack solutions."}),"

",i(t.p,{children:["For more information about how to use the tailwind css and the features it includes, ",n(t.a,{href:"https://v2.tailwindcss.com/docs",children:"read the documentation"}),"."]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"the-power-of-tailwind-css-in-modern-ui-design",children:["The Power of Tailwind CSS in Modern UI Design",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#the-power-of-tailwind-css-in-modern-ui-design",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Styling web applications has always been a challenge, especially when balancing custom designs with maintainability. Tailwind CSS has simplified this by providing utility-first styling, making it easier to create responsive and consistent UI components."}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"By default, Tailwind resets most browser styles, which is beneficial for UI consistency but can be confusing when working with content-rich pages like blogs or articles."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Instead of manually writing complex styles, Tailwind's typography plugin (@tailwindcss/typography) allows developers to apply beautiful, responsive typography with just a single class."}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Now we're going to try out to discover unique feature of Next Js which I have found!"}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"leveraging-nextjs-for-scalable-and-seo-friendly-web-apps",children:["Leveraging Next.js for Scalable and SEO-Friendly Web Apps",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#leveraging-nextjs-for-scalable-and-seo-friendly-web-apps",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"I have worked extensively with Next.js, a powerful React framework that provides server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and API routes‚Äîmaking it a go-to choice for building scalable web applications."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Some key benefits of using Next.js for PWA development include:"}),"
",i(t.blockquote,{children:["
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Faster Load Times ‚Äì Thanks to automatic static optimization and pre-fetching."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Improved SEO ‚Äì With built-in SSR, ensuring content is indexed correctly."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"API Routes ‚Äì Allowing backend logic directly within the project, reducing dependency on external servers."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"It's probably important that images look okay here by default as well:"}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(o,{src:"/blogs/c-d-x-PDX_a_82obo-unsplash-55192b8a.jpg",width:"718",height:"404",alt:"Image",sizes:"100vw"}),"

",n(t.span,{"data-line":""})]})}),n(t.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-caption":"","data-language":"html","data-theme":"github-dark",children:"this file contains code for showing simple api route in next js"})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"I have integrated Next.js in multiple projects, including full-stack applications with MongoDB and Express.js as the backend."}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Another key advantage is Built-in API Routes, which allow developers to create backend functionality within the same project using serverless functions."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"With Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR), Next.js enables real-time updates to static pages without requiring a full site rebuild, enhancing both speed and flexibility."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"The next/image component further optimizes image handling by providing automatic compression, lazy loading, and responsive resizing. These features, combined with seamless deployment options, make Next.js an ideal framework for building scalable, high-performance web applications. üöÄ"}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"backend-handling-business-logic--apis",children:["Backend: Handling Business Logic & APIs",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#backend-handling-business-logic--apis",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Sometimes you have headings directly underneath each other. In those cases you often have to undo the top margin on the second heading because it usually looks better for the headings to be closer together than a paragraph followed by a heading should be."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"database-storing-and-managing-data-",children:["Database: Storing and Managing Data ‚Ä¶",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#database-storing-and-managing-data-",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"For backend development, I primarily use Node.js with Express.js, which allows me to build lightweight, fast, and scalable REST APIs. Express simplifies route handling and middleware management, making backend development smooth."}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Python for AI/ML-Powered Features
Some projects require AI and ML integrations, where Python plays a crucial role. I use Python when implementing Gemini API-powered features or handling AI-driven tasks like X-ray analysis and structured note-making from voice input."})}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"mongodb--suggested-for-beginners",children:["MongoDB : Suggested for beginners",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#mongodb--suggested-for-beginners",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"For most of my full-stack applications, I use MongoDB, a NoSQL database that offers flexibility in handling structured and unstructured data. It works well with Mongoose for schema modeling."}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"supabase-suggested-for-your-personal-projects",children:["Supabase: Suggested for your personal projects",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#supabase-suggested-for-your-personal-projects",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"In projects like my Next.js developer blog, I use Supabase, an open-source Firebase alternative that provides authentication, real-time subscriptions, and PostgreSQL-backed storage..**"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"I‚Äôve set up my database to efficiently manage and store data, but handling databases in web development involves more than just storing information‚Äîit‚Äôs about structuring, querying, and optimizing for performance. That‚Äôs why I use a combination of modern database solutions to ensure scalability and reliability."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"choosing-the-right-database-for-the-job",children:["Choosing the right database for the job.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#choosing-the-right-database-for-the-job",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Relational databases like PostgreSQL work well for structured data and complex queries, while NoSQL databases like MongoDB are great for flexible, document-based storage. Each has its strengths, and selecting the right one depends on the project‚Äôs needs."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"indexing-and-query-optimization-matter",children:["Indexing and query optimization matter.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#indexing-and-query-optimization-matter",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"A database isn‚Äôt just a place to dump data‚Äîyou need efficient indexing and query optimization to keep things fast. Using indexes, caching, and query analysis tools helps reduce load times and improve performance, especially for large datasets."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"After setting up a database, it‚Äôs essential to plan for backups, security, and scalability. Ignoring these can lead to performance issues and data loss, so having a solid database management strategy is crucial before moving on to the next phase of development."}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"code-should-look-okay-by-default",children:["Code should look okay by default.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#code-should-look-okay-by-default",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.p,{children:["I think most people are going to use ",n(t.a,{href:"https://highlightjs.org/",children:"highlight.js"})," or ",n(t.a,{href:"https://prismjs.com/",children:"Prism"})," or something if they want to style their code blocks but it wouldn't hurt to make them look ",n(t.em,{children:"okay"})," out of the box, even with no syntax highlighting."]}),"
",i(t.p,{children:["Here's what a default ",n(t.code,{children:"tailwind.config.js"})," file looks like at the time of writing:"]}),"
",n(t.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:n(t.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",children:i(t.code,{"data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",children:[i(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:[n(t.span,{style:{color:"#79B8FF"},children:"module"}),n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"."}),n(t.span,{style:{color:"#79B8FF"},children:"exports"}),n(t.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:" ="}),n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" {"})]}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  purge: [],"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  theme: {"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"    extend: {},"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  },"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  variants: {},"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"  plugins: [],"})}),"
",n(t.span,{"data-line":"",children:n(t.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"}"})})]})})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Hopefully that looks good enough to you."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"what-about-backend-performance",children:["What about backend performance?",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#what-about-backend-performance",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"A backend that isn‚Äôt optimized is a backend that is painful to work with, and no one wants that. That‚Äôs why choosing the right backend stack is important, and Node.js happens to be one of the best choices for modern web development."}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Node.js is fast, but only if you use it right."}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"It‚Äôs event-driven and non-blocking, which means it can handle thousands of requests at once."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"But if you don‚Äôt manage your asynchronous operations properly, you‚Äôll turn your app into a mess."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Also, using synchronous functions in the main thread? Please don‚Äôt."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Since we need to have more items, here's another one."}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Nobody wants to write raw HTTP modules when they can just use Express."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Middleware in Express is like a set of superpowers‚Äîyou can handle authentication, logging, and routing cleanly."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"But don‚Äôt go overboard with middleware. Too much of it and your app will feel sluggish."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.ol,{start:"3",children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Lets see some tools for develpers for backend functionality checking"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Using MongoDB? Great for flexibility. PostgreSQL? Awesome for structured data."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"If you‚Äôre not using indexes in your database, you‚Äôre asking for slow queries."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Caching frequently used data with Redis or a similar tool can save you from unnecessary database hits."}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"A well-structured backend is what keeps a web app smooth and scalable. Ignoring performance now means dealing with major issues later."}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"what-about-frontend-animations",children:[n(t.strong,{children:"What about frontend animations?"}),n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#what-about-frontend-animations",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Animations make everything feel smoother, more interactive, and just plain cool‚Äîif done right. Three.js and GSAP help bring that magic to web applications."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"threejs-makes-3d-magic-possible",children:["Three.js makes 3D magic possible.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#threejs-makes-3d-magic-possible",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Want realistic 3D objects in the browser? Three.js has you covered."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"But be careful‚Äîrendering complex 3D models without optimization will turn your app into a slideshow."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Use shaders and optimized geometries if you want performance and visuals at the same time."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"gsap-is-the-king-of-smooth-animations",children:["GSAP is the king of smooth animations.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#gsap-is-the-king-of-smooth-animations",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Animating in vanilla CSS is fine, but GSAP takes it to another level."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"It gives full control over animations, from timelines to physics-based motion."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Too many animations? You‚Äôll make your site feel slow and clunky instead of smooth. Keep it balanced."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"webgl-vs-css-animations",children:["WebGL vs CSS animations.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#webgl-vs-css-animations",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:"WebGL is powerful, but overkill for simple transitions and effects."}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"If you just need some fade-ins, slides, or parallax effects, stick to GSAP or CSS."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:"But if you're doing something really complex, like interactive 3D experiences, WebGL is worth it."}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"github-is-the-backbone-of-every-project",children:["GitHub is the backbone of every project.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#github-is-the-backbone-of-every-project",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Version control isn't just about saving code‚Äîit‚Äôs about making projects manageable, collaborative, and secure."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"github-is-more-than-just-a-code-repository",children:["GitHub is more than just a code repository.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#github-is-more-than-just-a-code-repository",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Sure, you can store your code there, but you can also track issues, manage documentation, and handle deployments."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Good commit messages matter. ‚ÄúFixed stuff‚Äù is not a commit message."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Using branches properly avoids pushing half-finished features to production."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"pull-requests-are-your-best-friend",children:["Pull requests are your best friend.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#pull-requests-are-your-best-friend",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Every major change should go through a PR, even if you‚Äôre the only one working on the project."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Reviewing your own code before merging catches a lot of dumb mistakes."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"No one wants to debug something that was merged at 3 AM with zero review."}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"cicd-pipelines-automate-everything",children:["CI/CD pipelines automate everything.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#cicd-pipelines-automate-everything",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"GitHub Actions can run tests, lint code, and deploy projects automatically."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"If your code isn‚Äôt tested before merging, you‚Äôre inviting bugs into production."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Automating repetitive tasks saves time and prevents human error."}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"GitHub makes managing projects easier, as long as you don‚Äôt push secrets to public repos. That‚Äôs a mistake you‚Äôll only make once."}),"
",i(t.h2,{id:"there-are-other-tools-we-need-to-set-up-properly",children:["There are other tools we need to set up properly.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#there-are-other-tools-we-need-to-set-up-properly",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"I almost forgot to mention monitoring, logging, and security tools. You can have the best-designed app, but if it crashes in production with no error logs, you won‚Äôt know why.
We even included table styles, check it out:"}),"
",i(t.table,{children:[n(t.thead,{children:i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.th,{children:"Tool"}),n(t.th,{children:"Purpose"}),n(t.th,{children:"Why it matters"})]})}),i(t.tbody,{children:[i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.td,{children:"Sentry"}),n(t.td,{children:"Error tracking"}),n(t.td,{children:"Helps catch and debug issues"})]}),i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.td,{children:"LogRocket"}),n(t.td,{children:"Session replay & analytics"}),n(t.td,{children:"See what users experience"})]}),i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.td,{children:"Postman"}),n(t.td,{children:"API testing"}),n(t.td,{children:"Ensures APIs work as expected"})]}),i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.td,{children:"Docker"}),n(t.td,{children:"Containerization"}),n(t.td,{children:"Keeps app environments stable"})]}),i(t.tr,{children:[n(t.td,{children:"Nginx"}),n(t.td,{children:"Reverse proxy/load balancer"}),n(t.td,{children:"Helps with scalability"})]})]})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"We also need to make sure environment variables are handled properly, like if I wanted to store DATABASE_URL or tell you the good news about dotenv for managing environment variables securely."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"sometimes-i-even-use-node-in-headings",children:["Sometimes I even use node in headings.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#sometimes-i-even-use-node-in-headings",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:'Even though it‚Äôs probably a bad idea, and historically I‚Äôve had a hard time making it look good. This "wrap the code blocks in backticks" trick works pretty well though really.'}),"
",n(t.p,{children:'Another thing I‚Äôve done in the past is put a Dockerfile inside of a project, like if I wanted to ensure a Node.js app runs consistently across different environments. I don‚Äôt love that it requires extra setup, but it avoids the classic "it works on my machine" problem.'}),"
",i(t.h4,{id:"we-havent-talked-about-debugging-yet",children:["We haven't talked about debugging yet.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#we-havent-talked-about-debugging-yet",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"But now we have. If you‚Äôre not using Node.js debugger, Postman, and console.log (wisely), you‚Äôll have a tough time fixing issues."}),"
",i(t.h3,{id:"we-still-need-to-think-about-scaling-our-apps",children:["We still need to think about scaling our apps.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#we-still-need-to-think-about-scaling-our-apps",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",i(t.h4,{id:"lets-make-sure-we-dont-screw-that-up-with-poor-database-queries-either",children:["Let‚Äôs make sure we don‚Äôt screw that up with poor database queries, either.",n(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#lets-make-sure-we-dont-screw-that-up-with-poor-database-queries-either",children:n(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})})]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Phew, with any luck we have styled the backend, animations, deployment, and GitHub sections properly, and they look pretty good."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Let's add a closing paragraph here so things end with a decently sized block of text. I can‚Äôt explain why I want things to end that way, but I have to assume it‚Äôs because I think things will look weird or unbalanced if there is a heading too close to the end of the document."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"What I‚Äôve written here is probably long enough, but adding this final sentence can‚Äôt hurt."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Best Practices for Writing Clean and Maintainable Code
description: How to deploy your Next.js apps on Vercel.
author: Aditya Aman

title: The Power of JavaScript Frameworks: Angular vs. React vs. Vue.js
description: Get a detailed comparison of three popular JavaScript frameworks - Angular, React, and Vue.js. Understand the strengths, weaknesses, and use cases for each framework to make an informed decision for your next web development project.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Mindfulness and Meditation Techniques for Developers: Improving Focus and Clarity
description: Integrating mindfulness practices helps developers cultivate present-moment awareness, fostering focus, problem-solving, and work-life balance.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Mastering CSS Grid Layout: A Comprehensive Guide
description: Dive into the world of CSS Grid Layout with this comprehensive guide. Learn how to create responsive and dynamic layouts using CSS Grid, and explore various examples and best practices for building modern web interfaces.
author: Aditya Aman

title: The Rise of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs): A Game Changer in Web Development
description: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) have transformed how users interact with web applications. Learn about the benefits of PWAs, their architecture, and how to build highly performant, offline-capable web apps using modern web technologies.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Focus on getting Internships and work
description: Integrating mindfulness practices helps developers cultivate present-moment awareness, fostering focus, problem-solving, and work-life balance.
author: Aditya Aman

title: RESTful APIs: Building Blocks of Modern Web Applications
description: Uncover the fundamental concepts of RESTful APIs and their crucial role in modern web application development.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Web Accessibility: Inclusive Design for All Users
description: Embrace the principles of web accessibility and ensure that your web applications reach all users, regardless of their abilities.
author: Aditya Aman

title: Best Practices for Web Accessibility: Building Inclusive Websites
description: Ensuring web accessibility is vital for reaching a broader audience and creating inclusive digital experiences. This blog highlights essential web accessibility best practices, guidelines, and tools to make your websites accessible to everyone.
author: Aditya Aman

title: 10 Essential Web Development Tools for Productivity
description: Discover 10 must-have web development tools that can significantly boost your productivity, streamline your workflow, and enhance code quality.
author: Aditya Aman
